name: Groupon ComClone
tag_list: groupon-clone, groupon-script, groupon-clone-demo, groupon-clone-download, groupon-clone-for-sale, groupon-clone-script, groupon-clone-sites, groupon-clone-software, groupon-clone-template, open-source-groupon-clone
overview:
Its Time to be part of the successful new ecommerce trend. Start your own group buying site like Groupon Clone Script or Living Social. Our Ready Made solution will get your website online in speed at an web reasonable pricing. Be the first in your city, town or Locality.

General Features:

  • Referral System.
  • Daily Deals Email Subscription for Multi Cities.
  • Social Media: Deals sharing through Facebook and Twitter can be made at ease.
  • Email / Invite a friend option.
  • Paypal : Capture either a partial amount or the full amount of the authorization.
  • Paypal : Void the authorization, if the deal is not completed.
  • Google Maps Integration for Businesses.
  • Separate page for business and partners contacts.
  • One-page easy shopping cart system.
  • Integrated with PayPal merchant Gateway by default (other gateways can be integrated on demand).
  • Recently Closed Deals can be viewed in a separate page.
  • Ability to place the deals in advance and the same will get activated on the specified date for a particular city.
  • Ability to place the deals in advance and the same will get activated on the specified date for a particular city.
  • User account page with purchase history and account overview details with the ability to manage shipping addresses, password changes, Print Invoices, etc.
  • Shopping Cart can be integrated with SSL certificates.
  • SEO friendly URLs and coding.
  • Ability to add more pages using the backend system.
  • Website Search Functionality.
  • Multilingual Support.

Backend Features :

  • User friendly Magento Admin panel with secure Login.
  • Multiple Admin accounts can be created with different privileges.
  • Unlimited number of cities or locations can be added with different deals.
  • Create new deals in advance.
  • Easy-to-use daily deals module in which the admin can specify Start / End Time, Deal dates, Minimum and Maximum purchase requirements.
  • Ability to view all the user details and the purchases.
  • Once the deal is closed, users will not be able to purchase more deals.
  • Good reporting system.
  • Recent deals can be added through the administrator module.
  • And Many, Many more!!
